<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Callback to merge one source of unmerged symbols.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/dbimoduledescriptorbuilder/#a8f44fd07ed14812051c2ca7faece78f3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/dbimoduledescriptorbuilder/#a8f44fd07ed14812051c2ca7faece78f3">MergeSymbolsCallback</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343a902b0d55fddef6f8d651fe1035b7d4bd">Error</a> (&#42;)(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Ctx, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a2632601eef2a7254d0d50e82ba2ab620a5214a8a633c296d1d9d504fc54556692">Symbols</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter">BinaryStreamWriter</a> &amp;Writer);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/dbimoduledescriptorbuilder/#ab21ba596a89fe332612da0fd7089c39f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/dbimoduledescriptorbuilder/#ab21ba596a89fe332612da0fd7089c39f">setMergeSymbolsCallback</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Ctx, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/dbimoduledescriptorbuilder/#a8f44fd07ed14812051c2ca7faece78f3">MergeSymbolsCallback</a> Callback) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MergeSymsCtx = Ctx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MergeSymsCallback = Callback;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
